title: Merchandise Website: Summarization and Sentiment Analysis
description: A web app developed using Vite (ReactJS) and Firebase, integrating BART-Large-CNN for summarization and DistilBERT for sentiment analysis, deployed with Flask and Docker. Trained on a 6,000-review dataset crawled with WebHarvy.

title: Autonomous Robotic Car
description: An Arduino-powered robotic car with obstacle avoidance, fire detection, and water-spraying features, designed for hazard response.

title: RIYA's Chatbot
description: A mobile chatbot application developed with Flutter and powered by a fine-tuned Llama-3.2-3B-Instruct model, using Transformers and Unsloth on a custom dataset.

title: Tomato Ripeness Computer Vision
description: A computer vision system built using Python and YOLOv8m to detect and classify tomato ripeness from photos, videos, and real-time camera input.

title: RIYA's Speech Summarization
description: A multilingual speech-to-text summarization system using Python and mT5, supporting English, Indonesian, Russian, French, and Chinese. Includes real-time STT, customizable summarization, and TTS output.

title: PAPI (Powerful Artistic Photo Innovator)
description: A Python-based desktop image editor developed with Tkinter and OpenCV. Includes features such as filtering, brightness adjustment, and artistic enhancements.

title: Urban Night City
description: A 3D modeling and animation project created using Blender, visualizing a vibrant futuristic city at night as part of a design course.

title: Resume Reviewer
description: Review and assess 769 student resumes for President University's Batch 2023 and 2024, completed within one month from Nov to Dec 2024. Conducted fully in English.

title: Hunt The Wumpus
description: An AI-based grid game developed using Python and Alpha-Beta Pruning to simulate strategic gameplay in a 6x6 Hunt-The-Wumpus environment.

title: Pookies
description: An Android chatbot app built using Java in Android Studio, powered by OpenAI's API and integrated with Firebase for backend services.

title: WellBelle
description: An AI-powered chatbot for disease prediction, using Naive Bayes classification and TF-IDF. Enhanced with spaCy for advanced natural language processing.

title: MoTrack
description: A simple yet functional full-stack expense tracker website developed as an academic project. Built using Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Drizzle ORM, and Clerk for authentication.

title: Pet Shop Management System
description: An academic project combining a website and a desktop GUI to manage pet shop operations such as appointment scheduling, product checkout, and employee management. Built using PHP, MySQL, Java, JavaScript, CSS, and Bootstrap.
